text: Mba tɨvara, nde gumgir ŋkaa, nde wari won gumgir pani piin kɨri. Nde za kha tɨva zɨn ŋgɨri. Nde za wari mbevav, nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi piin kɨri. Nza kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Fhe Bakɨme wari wo zɨri ndi vunfi gumgi, ana mbe zɨri mbevi. Ana wo zɨri mbevi gumgi, ana mbe kora mbuav, tɨvar vhuuŋra mbe mbui.”
